has_unlocked_three_hole_course: has_unlocked_classic_a or has_unlocked_classic_b or has_unlocked_classic_c or has_unlocked_resort_a or has_unlocked_resort_b or has_unlocked_resort_c or has_unlocked_special

has_unlocked_normal_stages: has_unlocked_normal_stage_one and has_unlocked_normal_stage_two and has_unlocked_normal_stage_three and has_unlocked_normal_stage_four and has_unlocked_normal_stage_five and has_unlocked_normal_stage_six and has_unlocked_normal_stage_seven and has_unlocked_normal_stage_eight and has_unlocked_normal_stage_nine and has_unlocked_normal_stage_ten
has_unlocked_reverse_stages: has_unlocked_reverse_stage_one and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_two and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_three and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_four and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_five and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_six and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_seven and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_eight and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_nine and has_unlocked_reverse_stage_ten
has_unlocked_hio_course_fg: has_unlocked_classic_a_fg or has_unlocked_classic_b_fg or has_unlocked_resort_a_fg or has_unlocked_resort_b_fg or has_unlocked_resort_c_fg or has_unlocked_classic_nine_fg or has_unlocked_resort_nine_fg or has_unlocked_eighteen_course_fg
